content.value:
I wrote a thing about rape for many reasons but mostly so we can stop perpetuating the culture that violates women in so many ways.

link.medium.com/cJ6qg8kU0eb

I debated not sharing this on a Monday morning - but I live through this every day. You can choose not to read it.
